title: Google\Cloud\NetworkSecurity\V1beta1\AuthorizationPolicy\Rule\Destination
name: Destination
description:
Specification of traffic destination attributes.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.networksecurity.v1beta1.AuthorizationPolicy.Rule.Destination

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.hosts
params.description: Required. List of host names to match. Matched against the ":authority" header in http requests. At least one host should match. Each host can be an exact match, or a prefix match (example "mydomain.") or a suffix match (example ".myorg.com") or a presence (any) match "*".

params.name: data.ports
params.description: Required. List of destination ports to match. At least one port should match.

params.name: data.methods
params.description: Optional. A list of HTTP methods to match. At least one method should match. Should not be set for gRPC services.

params.name: data.http_header_match
params.description: Optional. Match against key:value pair in http header. Provides a flexible match based on HTTP headers, for potentially advanced use cases. At least one header should match. Avoid using header matches to make authorization decisions unless there is a strong guarantee that requests arrive through a trusted client or proxy.
